name: Solactive AG
membership: PRI - Principles for Responsible Investment - Signatory of the PRI Principles
goal:
Solactive AG has been founded in October 2007 and since then became one of the key players in the indexing space. Solactive AG is a German multi-asset class index provider provides market standard Benchmarks, including the use of external ESG data and has a focus on tailor-made indices; developing, calculating and distributing them worldwide. Solactive AG calculates indices for more than 400 clients in Europe, America and Asia. Approximately USD 200 billion are invested in products linked to more than 11,000 indices calculated by Solactive AG globally, primarily in the form of 400* ETFs. Solactive AG has offices in Frankfurt, Berlin, Dresden, Toronto and Hong Kong. Solactive AG is managed by Steffen Scheuble (Chief Executive Officer), Christian Vollmuth (Chief Risk Officer), Dirk Urmoneit (Chief Operational Officer) and Timo Pfeiffer (Chief Markets Officer). As of the 1 December 2019 the staff of Solactive AG (including its 100% subsidiaries) is 213 FTE.
*As of December 2019
euInitiatives: Solactive is currently observing relevant regulatory initatives in the field of indexing, mainly the EU Benchmarks Regulation and related legal acts such as the Market Abuse Regulation.
